metadata.description:
Hey web3!

My name is Mark Evans. I'm a music producer / songwriter from Los Angeles CA.  I've been making music for about 15 years and have worked in just about every genre there is. I spend a lot of my time producing music for other people, but over the last few years I have been making more of my own music; and am so excited to have found a space to release some of it! This is my first release on sound.xyz and i'm so happy to be here :)

this song is called Black Hole and was made with my friends Mija x Grabbitz x Choppa Dunks. It's a part of my project "sharks!" which is my duo with Choppa Dunks (we have some music out on spotify under "sharks!")

we wrote the song in February of 2021 along with a bunch of other music during that time with Mija and Grabbitz (and a lot of solo sharks!) stuff as well, so stay tuned for more collabs and singles from us soon :)
metadata.name: black hole #1
metadata.title: black hole
